where.label: CORRECTPREDEFINEDTYPE
where.expression: NOT (EXISTS(predefinedtype)) OR (predefinedtype <> ifcactuatortypeenum.userdefined) OR ((predefinedtype = ifcactuatortypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF\ifcobject.objecttype))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (NOT (EXISTS(purpose))) OR ((purpose <> ifcaddresstypeenum.userdefined) OR ((purpose = ifcaddresstypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF.userdefinedpurpose)))

where.label: VOIDSHAVEADVANCEDFACES
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(vsh <* voids | SIZEOF(QUERY(afs <* vsh.cfsfaces | (NOT ('IFC4X2.IFCADVANCEDFACE' IN TYPEOF(afs))))) = 0)) = 0

where.label: REQUIRESEDGECURVE
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(elpfbnds <* QUERY(bnds <* SELF\ifcface.bounds | 'IFC4X2.IFCEDGELOOP' IN TYPEOF(bnds.bound)) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(oe <* elpfbnds.bound\ifcedgeloop.edgelist | NOT ('IFC4X2.IFCEDGECURVE' IN TYPEOF(oe\ifcorientededge.edgeelement)))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: APPLICABLEEDGECURVES
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(elpfbnds <* QUERY(bnds <* SELF\ifcface.bounds | 'IFC4X2.IFCEDGELOOP' IN TYPEOF(bnds.bound)) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(oe <* elpfbnds.bound\ifcedgeloop.edgelist | NOT (SIZEOF(['IFC4X2.IFCLINE', 'IFC4X2.IFCCONIC', 'IFC4X2.IFCPOLYLINE', 'IFC4X2.IFCBSPLINECURVE'] * TYPEOF(oe\ifcorientededge.edgeelement\ifcedgecurve.edgegeometry)) = 1))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: CORRECTPREDEFINEDTYPE
where.expression: NOT (EXISTS(predefinedtype)) OR (predefinedtype <> ifcairterminaltypeenum.userdefined) OR ((predefinedtype = ifcairterminaltypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF\ifcobject.objecttype))

where.expression: NOT (EXISTS(predefinedtype)) OR (predefinedtype <> ifcairterminalboxtypeenum.userdefined) OR ((predefinedtype = ifcairterminalboxtypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF\ifcobject.objecttype))

where.label: CORRECTPREDEFINEDTYPE

where.label: CORRECTPREDEFINEDTYPE
where.expression: NOT (EXISTS(predefinedtype)) OR (predefinedtype <> ifcbeamtypeenum.userdefined) OR ((predefinedtype = ifcbeamtypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF\ifcobject.objecttype))

where.label: HASMATERIALPROFILESETUSAGE
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* USEDIN(SELF, 'IFC4X2.IFCRELASSOCIATES.RELATEDOBJECTS') | ('IFC4X2.IFCRELASSOCIATESMATERIAL' IN TYPEOF(temp)) AND ('IFC4X2.IFCMATERIALPROFILESETUSAGE' IN TYPEOF(temp.relatingmaterial)))) = 1

where.label: CORRECTPREDEFINEDTYPE
where.expression: NOT (EXISTS(predefinedtype)) OR (predefinedtype <> ifcbearingtypeenum.userdefined) OR ((predefinedtype = ifcbearingtypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF\ifcobject.objecttype))

where.label: CORRECTPREDEFINEDTYPE
where.expression: NOT (EXISTS(predefinedtype)) OR (predefinedtype <> ifcboilertypeenum.userdefined) OR ((predefinedtype = ifcboilertypeenum.userdefined) AND EXISTS(SELF\ifcobject.objecttype))

where.label: FIRSTOPERANDTYPE
where.expression: ('IFC4X2.IFCSWEPTAREASOLID' IN TYPEOF(firstoperand)) OR ('IFC4X2.IFCSWEPTDISCSOLID' IN TYPEOF(firstoperand)) OR ('IFC4X2.IFCBOOLEANCLIPPINGRESULT' IN TYPEOF(firstoperand))

where.label: FIRSTOPERANDCLOSED
where.expression: NOT ('IFC4X2.IFCTESSELLATEDFACESET' IN TYPEOF(firstoperand)) OR (EXISTS(firstoperand.closed) AND firstoperand.closed)

where.label: SECONDOPERANDCLOSED
where.expression: NOT ('IFC4X2.IFCTESSELLATEDFACESET' IN TYPEOF(secondoperand)) OR (EXISTS(secondoperand.closed) AND secondoperand.closed)
